art_vendors.description: Explore a world of comic art, from superhero sketches to graphic novel illustrations.
Dive into the realms of fantasy with stunning canvas paintings inspired by comics and sci-fi.
Marvel at superhero sculptures meticulously crafted to capture every detail.
Get your hands on exclusive comic book merchandise, from collectibles to apparel.
Witness the art of inking with live demonstrations and unique ink creations.

merch_vendors.description: Your one-stop shop for all things geeky and collectible, from action figures to posters.
Express your love for comics with a wide range of themed t-shirts and apparel.
Top off your superhero look with iconic hats and headwear from your favorite comics.
Discover rare and vintage comic book collectibles that every fan will cherish.
Decorate your space with stunning comic book posters featuring your beloved heroes.
